sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a rectangle.
message_1: A rectangle has a length of 10 centimeters and a width of 8 centimeters. What is the perimeter of the rectangle?
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a rectangle, you can use the formula: Perimeter = 2(Length + Width). In this case, the length is 10 centimeters and the width is 8 centimeters.

Perimeter = 2(10 + 8)
Perimeter = 2(18)
Perimeter = 36 centimeters

The perimeter of the rectangle is 36 centimeters.
